data.descriptor: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure
data.caption: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure A
data.news_body:
Format of Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate.

Sr. No. Particulars Details
1Name of CompanyRane Holdings Ltd
2CIN NO.L35999TN1936PLC002202
3 Outstanding borrowing of company as on 31st March / 31st December as applicable (in Rs cr) 59.11
4Highest Credit Rating during the previous FY AA-
4aName of the Credit Rating Agency issuing the Credit Rating mentioned in (4)ICRA LIMITED
5Name of Stock Exchange# in which the fine shall be paid in case of shortfall in the required borrowing under the frameworkBSE


We confirm that we are a Large Corporate as per the applicability criteria given under the SEBI circular SEBI/HO/DDHS/CIR/P/2018/144 dated November 26 2018. No



Name of the Company Secretary: Siva Chandrasekaran
Designation: Secretary
EmailId: investorservices@ranegroup.com
Name of the Chief Financial Officer: J Ananth
Designation: Chief Financial Officer
EmailId: investorservices@ranegroup.com

Date: 30/04/2025

Note: In terms para of 3.2(ii) of the circular beginning F.Y 2022 in the event of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt securities a fine of 0.2% of the shortfall shall be levied by Stock Exchanges at the end of the two-year block period. Therefore an entity identified as LC shall provide in its initial disclosure for a financial year the name of Stock Exchange to which it would pay the fine in case of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt markets.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Acquisition

Shares of the Company in RML post allotment is 17631213 Equity Shares representing 63.80% of post amalgamated issued and paid up share capital of the Company.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Meeting Held On February 06 2025 - Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI LODR
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors at their meeting held today have 

(i) approved the un-audited financial results for the quarter ended December 31 2024 along with the Limited Review Report. 
(ii)approved the re-appointment of Mr. Ganesh Lakshminarayan (DIN:00012583) as Chairman and Managing Director.
(iii) approved the notice of Postal Ballot to members in connection with the above. 

The meeting of the Board commenced at 11:16 hrs(IST) and concluded at 12:40 hrs(IST).

data.caption: Results - Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended December 31, 2023 (Unaudited - Standalone & Consolidated)
data.news_body: This is to inform that the BOD, inter alia, approved the un-audited financial results (Standalone & Consolidated) (UFR) of the Co. for the quarter and nine months ended Dec 31, 2023 as recommended by the Audit Committee at their respective meeting(s) held today (February 08, 2024). The UFR of the Co. is enclosed along with the limited review report on both standalone & consolidated results issued by M/s. BSR & Co. LLP, Chartered Accountants, Statutory Auditors. (Reg 33). The un-audited financial results (Standalone and consolidated) will be uploaded on the website of the Co. at www.ranegroup.com and stock exchanges at www.bseindia.com and www.nseindia.com (Reg 46). An Earnings release for the above results is also enclosed (Reg 30). The meeting of the BoD commenced at 16:55 hrs (IST) and concluded at 17:27 hrs (IST).

data.news_body:
